product_name: SmartWool Whimsy Charm Socks - Girls' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Perfect for everyday wear with sneakers or running shoes, the Smartwool Whimsy Charm Socks for girls add a splash of style to high-performance material and construction. Made with merino wool and nylon to absorb and wick moisture away from feet, keeping them dry and cool in summer, warm in winter. Odor-fighting properties of merino wool maintain even after multiple wears, perfect for camping or traveling. Supportive arch brace featured in the Smartwool Whimsy Charm socks adds support and structure where the foot needs it most. No-show style without cushioning means no bulkiness, perfect for wearing with fitted shoes or when she wants to feel especially light on her feet. Closeout.
short_description: Perfect for everyday wear with sneakers or running shoes, the Smartwool Whimsy Charm Socks for girls add a splash of style to high-performance material and construction.
